document.full_text: trevor cahill out-pitched opposing ace c.j. wilson again for his american league-best sixth victory as the oakland athletics beat the texas rangers 7-2 on monday.
document.title: cahill's sixth win powers a's past the rangers
lines_and_colors: trevor cahill out-pitched opposing ace c.j. wilson again for his american league-best sixth victory as the oakland athletics beat the texas rangers 7-2 on monday.
